Spectrum Loading Utilities

Functions to load data and return a Pandas data structure

load.file_read(filepath)

Read a .csv file into a dataframe to be manipulated

Parameters

filepath – (str, path object, or file-like object) .csv file to be read in

Returns

spectrum (pandas.df) Dataframe containing wavenumber information in the first column and intensity of line information in the second column

load.fits_read(filepath, wavekey='wave', speckey='spec')

Read in spectrum from a FITS file containing a table.

Parameters

  • filepath (str) – Path to FITS file to be read in.

  • wavekey (str) – Key corresponding to wavelength information in the FITS file.

  • speckey (str) – Key corresponding to intensity information in the FITS file.

Returns

Wavelengths axis from FITS file. spec (arr): Intensity axis from FITS file.

Return type

wave (arr)
